text:
Boomla.com | Senior Frontend Enginner | Budapest, Hungary | Full time | ONSITE

At Boomla, we are building a simple application platform for websites, a Website OS. It's like, throw away the entire stack, including the filesystem, and redesign it from scratch, based on paradigms that play well with the Web.

Website - https://boomla.com/#nerd

Short dev summary - https://boomla.com/f/short-summary

Longer dev summary - https://boomla.com/f/long-summary

Skills needed: deep knowledge of computer science fundamentals, TypeScript, React, testing, HTML, CSS. We need someone resourceful who can get things and needs no babysitting.

Email me at tibor.halter@COMPANYDOMAIN with your Linkedin/Github/Resume.
